original_title: The Stairs, The Suitcases and The Grand Hall of Books
overview: The poet Ali Sarandibi takes us to an experimental journey in to his work place in The Grand Hall of Books in Enghelab street in Tehran,best known for its bookshops and Tehran University.The sound bites from the shopkeepers tell the story of the arcade and how their work condition has changed lately.
title: The Stairs, The Suitcases and The Grand Hall of Books
